mapper.select: select a.id as id , a.question as title , convert(int, b.ex1) as ex1 , convert(int, b.ex2) as ex2 , convert(int, b.ex3) as ex3 , convert(int, b.ex4) as ex4 , convert(int, b.ex5) as ex5 , b.ex6, b.ex7, b.ex8, b.ex9, b.ex10 , b.total from ( select y.id, y.question from el_course_survey x inner join el_course_survey_question y on x.id = y.course_survey_id where x.course_id = #{courseId} ) a inner join ( select question_id , count(*) as total , round((sum(case when user_answer = '5' then 1.0 else 0 end) / count(*) * 100),0) ex1 , round((sum(case when user_answer = '4' then 1.0 else 0 end) / count(*) * 100),0) ex2 , round((sum(case when user_answer = '3' then 1.0 else 0 end) / count(*) * 100),0) ex3 , round((sum(case when user_answer = '2' then 1.0 else 0 end) / count(*) * 100),0) ex4 , round((sum(case when user_answer = '1' then 1.0 else 0 end) / count(*) * 100),0) ex5 , sum(case when user_answer = '5' then 1 else 0 end) as ex6 , sum(case when user_answer = '4' then 1 else 0 end) as ex7 , sum(case when user_answer = '3' then 1 else 0 end) as ex8 , sum(case when user_answer = '2' then 1 else 0 end) as ex9 , sum(case when user_answer = '1' then 1 else 0 end) as ex10 from el_course_account a inner join el_course_survey_action b on a.id = b.doc_id inner join el_course_survey_action_answer c on b.id = c.survey_action_id where a.course_id = #{courseId} and c.survey_gubun = 'M' group by question_id ) b on a.id = b.question_id

select a.title, a.ex1, convert(int, isnull(round(convert(decimal, count(b.user_answer)) / max(TOTALCOUNT) * 100, 0),0)) as ex2 from ( select 5 as ex1, '매우만족' as title union all select 4, '만족' union all select 3, '보통' union all select 2, '불만족' union all select 1, '매우불만족') a left outer join ( select user_answer, count(*) over() as totalcount from el_course_account a inner join el_course_survey_action b on a.id = b.doc_id inner join el_course_survey_action_answer c on b.id = c.survey_action_id where a.course_id = #{courseId} and c.survey_gubun = 'M' and question_id = #{questionId} ) b on a.ex1 = b.user_answer group by a.ex1, a.title
